alert.note: Alert for East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 2:26AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow ongoing. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Portions of the Nebraska Panhandle and Southeast Wyoming. * WHEN...Through 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
